briefTitle: A Trial to Compare American Heart Association (AHA) and Simple (SIM)Method to Give Adenosine to Treat Supra-ventricular Tachycardia (SVT)
officialTitle: A Randomised Controlled Trial of the Standard Versus a Simplified Adenosine Administration Method in the Treatment of Adult Patients With Supra- Ventricular Tachycardia (SVT)
summary: Study to compare non inferiority of giving adenosine with the simplified method vs the AHA method

primaryOutcome.measure: The Number of Patients With First Dose Successful Termination of the Supraventricular Tachycardia to a Sinus Rhythm of Less Than 140 With the AHA Versus a Simplified Method of Adenosine Administration
